means: （常指因寒冷、生病或愁苦）耸肩弓身的，伏首前倾的

sentence.Network_en: She is hunched forward over the wheel with a maniacal expression.
sentence.Network_cn: 她弓身伏在方向盘前，表情像疯了一样。

sentence.Network_en: A solitary hunched figure emerged from Number Ten.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个缩头弓身的孤独身影从唐宁街10号出来了。

sentence.Network_en: He sat with his shoulders hunched up.

PerfectNetExp.abs: one of the men asked , as hunched and withered a gargoyle ., 其中一个人团着身子 , 憔悴得像房屋顶上的滴水嘴 , 问道.

schools of glittering silver-white fish swoop past a statue of a man hunched over a workbench , the first seabed artwork in a new underwater museum in Mexico s Caribbean Sea .闪耀著银白色光芒的鱼群，掠过一座弓身向著工作台的人像，这是墨西哥加勒比海域一座新建海底博物馆的第一件海底艺术作品。

the man framed against the glow of inner hallway was probably tall , but hung his head and hunched his body forward in such a way that it was difficult to make sure .被屋里走廊的灯光照亮的那个人，可能个子很高，但是向前低着的头和隆起的背，看起来又很难说他是不是个子很高。
The dancers alternately arched and hunched their backs ., 舞蹈者交替地将背向后弯和弓起.

list.abs: as soon as I arrived I knew the hunch was right .我一到就知道我们猜想得不错。

on a hunch ( call it nursing judgment ) , I checked the chart after the admitting clerk had finished registering the family . no address-they were homeless . the waiting room was warm .我有一个直觉（可以称之为护士的判断力)，在接待员为他们全家做了登记以后，我查看了登记表格。没有填写地址-原来他们是无家可归的人。候诊室很暖和
I had worked on this job for ten years and I have a hunch that we workers were getting pooper .我干这行已10年了。我总有一种预感：我们这些工人是越来越穷。
hot-rolled plain bar 热轧光圆钢筋hunched beam 加腋梁-
certain candidates hunch over , glance furtively around the room or wring their sweaty palms .某些求职者会伸直身体，茫然地瞟着房间周围，或是扭动出汗的手掌。

entry.tran: （常指因寒冷、生病或愁苦）耸肩弓身的，伏首前倾的
entry.def: If you are hunched, or hunched up, you are leaning forwards with your shoulders raised and your head down, often because you are cold, ill, or unhappy.

example.ex: A solitary hunched figure emerged from Number Ten...
example.tran: 一个缩头弓身的孤独身影从唐宁街10号出来了。

example.ex: He got a stiff neck and a sore back from sitting hunched up for so long.
example.tran: 他因为长时间弓身坐着而脖子僵直，背部酸痛。

means.word_mean: 1. having the back and shoulders rounded; not erect;
